description: This file contains CSS variables for theme management, styling rules for the application layout, and responsive design rules for mobile.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment, handling theme-related background and text colors.

classes.name: App-content
classes.description: Container for the main content of the app, ensuring proper spacing for footer.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the logo, including animation for spinning effect.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header of the application, with styles for layout and color upon theme change.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, incorporating transitions for theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes, with styling for hover and active states.
